NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay Ahead of the Ethereum Curve
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Don't just take our word for it, see what our users have to say.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Etherscan has been an invaluable tool for monitoring new Ethereum blocks and transactions. The real-time updates and detailed information have greatly enhanced my development workflow.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Etherscan's block explorer is a game-changer for Ethereum developers. Its user-friendly interface and powerful search capabilities make it a breeze to navigate and analyze the blockchain.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I can't imagine developing on Ethereum without Etherscan. It's my go-to resource for getting up-to-the-minute information on new blocks, transactions, and smart contract deployments.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about tracking new Ethereum blocks
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What is an Ethereum block explorer?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: An Ethereum block explorer is a tool that allows you to search, view and analyze data from the Ethereum blockchain. It provides a user-friendly interface to find details about specific blocks, transactions, accounts and more.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How can I use this app to find new Ethereum blocks?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Our app connects directly to the Ethereum network and displays the latest mined blocks in real-time. You can search for a specific block by number or hash, or simply view the continually updating list of new blocks as they are added to the chain.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: What information is shown for each new block?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: For every new Ethereum block found, the app displays the block number, timestamp, miner address that received the block reward, total transaction fees, size in bytes, and number of transactions included in that block.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I view transaction details from discovered blocks?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, you can click on any block in the list to view its detailed information page. This shows all the transactions included in that block, including the sender, recipient addresses, Ether value transferred, and any data payloads.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is there a way to get notifications for new blocks?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Absolutely. Our app allows you to enable browser notifications so you get alerted whenever a new Ethereum block gets mined and added to the blockchain. This ensures you never miss tracking the latest network activity.

STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Stay up-to-date with the latest Ethereum blocks and transactions. EtherView provides real-time monitoring and notifications for new blocks on the Ethereum blockchain.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Our app constantly monitors the Ethereum blockchain for newly mined blocks, ensuring you never miss a transaction or event.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Gain deep insights into each block with detailed information on transactions, smart contract executions, and other on-chain activities.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Set up custom alerts to be notified instantly when specific conditions are met, such as high-value transactions or contract deployments.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Seamlessly integrate our block discovery capabilities into your Ethereum wallet or decentralized application for enhanced functionality.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Built on a decentralized and resilient infrastructure, our app ensures data integrity and uninterrupted service, aligning with Ethereum's principles.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Access our powerful APIs to build custom solutions tailored to your specific needs, enabling seamless integration into your existing systems.
CTA_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our cutting-edge Ethereum block explorer. Get real-time updates on the latest blocks mined, ensuring you never miss a beat in the ever-evolving world of blockchain.

PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Ethereum Block Explorer
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What is an Ethereum block explorer?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: An Ethereum block explorer is a tool that allows you to search and browse the Ethereum blockchain. It provides detailed information about blocks, transactions, accounts, and smart contracts.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How does your Ethereum block explorer work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Our block explorer connects directly to Ethereum nodes to fetch the latest blockchain data. It then parses and organizes this data in an easy-to-navigate interface for users.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What information can I find on your block explorer?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: You can view details on recent blocks, pending transactions, accounts and balances, smart contract code and more. The explorer makes the blockchain data human-readable.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is your Ethereum block explorer free to use?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, our Ethereum block explorer is completely free to use. You can access all the blockchain data and features without any payment or subscription required.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Stay ahead of the curve with our cutting-edge Ethereum block explorer. Get instant notifications for newly mined blocks and access detailed information about transactions, smart contracts, and more.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Our platform leverages the power of decentralized networks, ensuring your data remains secure, transparent, and resistant to censorship or downtime.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Seamlessly integrate our block explorer into your dApps or services with our well-documented and easy-to-use APIs, available in multiple programming languages.
